displaybio: American, born in Italy, 1876, died after 1940
biography:
Louis Borgo: painter, designer, decorator; sometimes called an American Impressionist. Born: 3 Jan, 1876, in Italy (probably in Lizzano in Belvedere, near Bologna).
Attended the Accademia di Belle Arti di Brera, Milan.
Came to America in 1911 with wife Gisette; naturalized 1917; lived in New York and Washingtonville, Orange County, NY
According to US census, Borgo was 63 in 1940; death date unknown.
